book.title: The Essential Guide to Open Source Flash Development
book.author: Chris Allen
Wade Arnold
Aral Balkan
Nicolas Cannasse
John Grden
Marc Hughes
R. Jon MacDonald
Patrick Mineault
Andy Zupko
book.description: A practical development guide to creating Flash applications with OS Flash tools and workflows.

book.title: Beginning PHP and MySQL: From Novice to Professional, Third Edition
book.author: W. Jason Gilmore
book.description: A comprehensive introduction to two of the most prominent open source technologies on the planet: the PHP scripting language and the MySQL database server.

book.title: Pro Web 2.0 Mashups: Remixing Data and Web Services
book.author: Raymond Yee
book.description: Teaches you everything you need to create useful, dynamic real–world applications using APIs, web services, Ajax, web standards, and server–side languages.

book.title: AdvancED AIR Applications
book.author: Marco Casario
Koen De Weggheleire
Peter Elst
Zach Stepek
book.description: Takes you step-by-step through what's possible with AIR, not only teaching you the advanced techniques, but also providing case studies to show them in action.

book.title: Beginning PHP and MySQL E-Commerce: From Novice to Professional, Second Edition
book.author: Emilian Balanescu
Christian Darie
book.description: Covers every step of the design and building process involved in creating powerful, extendable e–commerce web sites.
